<Text:Pterostylis diminuta
1:
--------------------
Text: Pterostylis diminuta:  As with similar greenhoods, the flowering plants differ from those which are not flowering.
Triplets:<Pterostylis diminuta
2:
--------------------
Text: Pterostylis diminuta:  The non-flowering plants have a rosette of leaves flat on the ground but the flowering plants have up to twelve small, partly green, partly translucent flowers and lack a rosette.
Triplets:<Pterostylis diminuta
